attributes.additional_details:
The Bill may furthermore be detrimental to most parents especially those of African descent as it has no safeguarding for parents and guardians or medical professionals & specialists.

According to research published by KHN, 94% of young people with gender identity issues grow out of it. This is the reason we object to this bill being passed into law.

https://khn.org/morning-breakout/research-on-children-growing-out-of-gender-dysphoria-adds-layer-of-complexity-to-transgender-care/
attributes.background: The proposed bill states and allows people in Scotland to self-identify by getting a gender change certificate through an affidavit without medical approval or consultation.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

https://petitions.parliament.scot/
